title: Emerald and Diamond Grand Haaram Necklace
materials: Cultured Pearls. Finished with authentic Hyderabadi Polish for a lasting lustre.
features: This exquisite haaram features a contemporary design with intricate filigree work, meticulously handcrafted by skilled artisans. The necklace showcases a graduating arrangement of diamond-studded paisley motifs, punctuated with vibrant emeralds. Delicate pearls dangle gracefully, adding a touch of traditional elegance. The centerpiece features a larger pear-shaped emerald, elegantly framed in diamonds and pearls, creating a stunning focal point.
colors: Warm Yellow (Gold). The colour combination evokes regality and sophistication.
occasions: and significant family functions like Seemantham or Half-Saree Function. This haaram adds a touch of timeless elegance to any special occasion.
description: This haaram seamlessly blends traditional South Indian aesthetics with modern design sensibilities. The use of high-quality emeralds and diamonds, combined with expert craftsmanship, makes it a valuable heirloom piece. The Hyderabadi polish ensures lasting shine and durability. This necklace is a statement piece that reflects refined taste and cultural appreciation.
